CustomField.formula: IF(Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "NSP20",'Sum of Auto calculated LP, Wireless and Additional LPs.','The total calculated license points is the sum of the license points required to manage the products in this quote and any additional network elements (NE) added above.')
CustomField.label: What is total calculated LP?
